messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Your real captain is here honk

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Anybody that watches anime needs to get off my ship

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Dont get yiffed by the syndicate furries

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Whoever cancelled that is a furry and must be put down

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Call shuttle, Y/N

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Bar.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Electrical Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space-winter, a whoop of mice have swarmed into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Primary Tool Storage.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We have been doing better than expected, Expect free refreshments at the bar for the next few minutes

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Scratch and Snifff - Colonoscopy Edition, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Have taken note of the situation upon Scratch and Snifff - Colonoscopy Edition and have come to the conclusion that it does not warrant the abandonment of the station.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies dete'fZ\kg5_0-BZZZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Quarter Solar Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Massive bluespace translocation detected.
